short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brightspace design fixer for better use of whitespace

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extensions tries to use all available whitespace in brightspace. This is done by making the content element bigger.
Further some small design improvements are applied to make the application more usefull.
